## Why R?

- Automation
  - Automated pipeline and workflow (Increase efficiency)

- Accessibility 
  - multiple output formats (docx, pptx, pdf, html) and through dashboards and Apps (Shiny) 

- Integration with other tools and platforms 
  - ODK, RedCap, APIs, etc.

- Collaboration and Communication 
  - Customized Reports, R packages, APIs, etc.

- Reproducibility
  - Auditable workflows from raw data to final reports


## Monitoring and Evaluation

- collect and analyze data | Report findings

  - data: administrative or research 
  
  - software: MS excel, Access, or custom apps

## Getting Started!

- Don't learn everything about R. 

- Learn R for one specific purpose at a time. 
  - how to import excel into R.
  - how to rename columns in R. 
  - how to summarize data in R. 

- Use R in your daily work.
